parameters.name: Configuration
parameters.description: The configurations of the new reserved instances. You can specify up to 100 new reserved instances.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description:
The region ID of the reserved instance.

You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~25609~~) operation to query the most recent region list.

parameters.name: ReservedInstanceId
parameters.description: The IDs of reserved instances that you want to modify. You can specify up to 20 reserved instance IDs.
